commentBody:
What is so great about a partisan political convention?

Will Cleveland's Democratic black Mayor Frank Jackson and black police chief Calvin Williams be attending the Republican convention?

Will the families of Timothy Russell, Malissa Williams and Tamir Rice be welcomed to the convention so that their loved ones can be mentioned and mourned?

Will the Republican convention in Cleveland mention their lives and mourn their passing?

Will the Republican convention attendees be strapped and armored exercising their 1st and 2nd Amendment rights?

Will colored black Republicans make-up 5% of the Cleveland convention attendees?

Will LeBron James and the N.B.A. Champion Cleveland Cavaliers being attending the Republican convention?
